function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of consideration for complex multi-modal interactions that impact occupants in actual office buildings when assessing environmental conditions.","category":"Improper architectural designs","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited control of tenants over indoor environmental quality may lead to suboptimal conditions for designs","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Use of the urban water cycle and cyber-physical systems may increase the risk of disease transmission through water supply and drainage
